---
title: "Welcome"
---

Who are the favorites to win the 2022 World Cup in Qatar? This website is the hom for my World Cup statisitcal simulations model. The KU Leuven DTAI Sports Analytics Lab executed a statistical simulation to answer these questions. Our simulation takes into account results of historical games to estimate each team's skill level and predict the odds of each country's performance. The probabilities are based on 10,000 simulations. 

Read more at my blog [Between the Pipes](https://betweenpipes.wordpress.com/).
